Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a buff-coloured pottery vessel, the interior is partially covered with a yellow-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a cream-coloured slip and remains of one line of red-painted Coptic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394213) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394213)
